price: This is how We relate to you [O Prophet] from the stories of the past, and We have given you a Reminder[33] from Us.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدۡ سَبَقَۚ وَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
